content: Protestation of Integrity and Prayer for Protection.
I have [relied on and] trusted [confidently] in the  without wavering  I shall not slip.
Examine me, O , and try me;
Test my heart and my mind.
For Your lovingkindness is before my eyes,
And I have walked [faithfully] in Your truth.
I do not sit with deceitful  unethical  worthless men,
Nor seek companionship with pretenders (self-righteous hypocrites).
I hate the company of evildoers,
And will not sit with the wicked.
I will wash my hands in innocence,
And I will go about Your altar, O ,
That I may proclaim with the voice of thanksgiving
